channel.title: Wolverine Claws {Made By ChopStickz}
channel.description:
Ok, so i was bored.. decided to make somthing for RS so i decided to make some wolverine claws i dont know why lolol.. but here it is.. lately ive been trying to add my models to a client/server but i never seem to get it working =\ i realy dont know what im doing wrong... i do "add model [Drop ID & Weild ID]" i put the script in my class8.java i compile, go in do add model close the client compile again then open try ::pickup and nothing happens. the ::pickup works for other items. if somone can help please do :) thanks. hope u like this model haha, its like my 3-4th :P rate plox :)
Weilded To A Male: [IMG]http://i85.photobucket.com/albums/k65/ryanrs2006/RSGuyWithClaws.jpg[/img]
Plain No Male: [IMG]http://i85.photobucket.com/albums/k65/ryanrs2006/WolverineWeilded.jpg[/img]

item.title: Wolverine Claws {Made By ChopStickz}
item.dc:creator: @chopstickz chopstickz
item.description:
@chopstickz wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:12, topic:320533”][quote author=chopstickz link=topic=417005.msg3068317#msg3068317 date=1261362665]

yea i tested but i dunno how to do like so it react the same as claws so ima try to do that, ima add it to react like d claws with spec also. but i need to know how to put it as claws, i did it with DATMaker and set to right hand so wen u walk the one on the left side is like off your hand lolol kinda messed up.

Use the ‘Gloves’ animation, will work fine.
[/quote]lol i wanted to put it as a weapon, but if i put as gloves its gonna be more of a fancy item but thats alright i guess, if i put as weapon im guessin i would have to do my own animation? o.o

No you prune.
Use the gloves animation just to make it move like claws, you can still use it as a weapon, it’ll still wield like one. :rolleyes:[/quote]oh lol

Read full topic

item.title: Wolverine Claws {Made By ChopStickz}
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“chopstickz, post:11, topic:320533”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=417005.msg3068084#msg3068084 date=1261354160]

yea i tested but i dunno how to do like so it react the same as claws so ima try to do that, ima add it to react like d claws with spec also. but i need to know how to put it as claws, i did it with DATMaker and set to right hand so wen u walk the one on the left side is like off your hand lolol kinda messed up.

Use the ‘Gloves’ animation, will work fine.
[/quote]lol i wanted to put it as a weapon, but if i put as gloves its gonna be more of a fancy item but thats alright i guess, if i put as weapon im guessin i would have to do my own animation? o.o[/quote]

No you prune.
Use the gloves animation just to make it move like claws, you can still use it as a weapon, it’ll still wield like one. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Wolverine Claws {Made By ChopStickz}
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

About the pickup, look at the command and make sure its not limiting to a certain number. Some servers have put a peak on there pickup for 7955 or such, so just raise the peak on your pickup command.

@MODEL - Not too bad, very original, but this is just another version of “Claws” imo

Read full topic
